title: [Question]CIE ISA PREPARATION HELP
content: What to refer to prepare for sem 3 cie ISA to  score S grade

comments.body: isn't it just like evs in p cycle, just read slides and attend exam
I just checked the slides, I didn't get anything like to study, which might come in exam, can anyone provide some other notes or link something.?
Honestly common sense and reading slides once should be enough to get an A-S
Cie is way easier than both consti and EVS just read the slides once
When will the CIE exam take place?
When will the CIE exam take place?
I know, but do you happen to know the exact date? Is it on 20th Sep(Saturday) for us?
no idea, they haven't released the timetable yet
